alert.note: Alert for Butler (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 4:05PM EST until February 19 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers... Great Miami River near Middletown. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Great Miami River near Middletown. * WHEN...From this evening to late Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, water approaches structures south of Route 73 between Excello and the Great Miami River. This includes properties along Oxford Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 PM EST Thursday the stage was 8.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 13.0 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
